title: Intensive Short Story Writing Workshop Utilizing the Metaphoring Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic writing skills and literary imagination
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program for undergraduate students/job seekers interested in short story writing, conducted in smartphone-based mobile learning environments. Responsive content is provided considering PC-unavailable settings.

learning_goals: Learners can compose an outline for a short story of approximately 500 characters using metaphoring techniques
Learners can develop characters, spaces, and plots by combining metaphorical thinking and visual modeling
Learners can perform peer assessment-based writing improvements using a feedback system in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
